title: Ponderosa Natural Medicine - Wheat Ridge, CO
description: Specialties: Ponderosa Naturopathic Medicine offers comprehensive and effective natural medical care. Dr. Karrina Wallace, ND is trained in both conventional and natural medicine and uses a variety of treatments to establish health. During your visit you will have time to explain your health history and health goals and receive a thorough physical exam. Both conventional and alternative labs will be used in order to provide a comprehensive treatment plan. Dr. Wallace specializes in using nutritional medicine, herbal medicine, homeopathic medicine and detoxification treatments to aid in the recovery of chronic health issues. Ponderosa Natural Medicine offer holistic medical services for the entire family to naturally improve both physical and mental health. Established in 2015. Ponderosa Natural Medicine was established in Denver, Colorado in 2015 to bring access registered naturopathic doctors to the area. The clinic has now moving to west highlands/ Wheat Ridge area. The new office will provide expanded services such as on site blood draws, on site medicinary, and collaboration with an OB/GYN, a Chinese medical practitioner and a massage therapist. We provide a professional and caring integrative clinic to meet your and your families needs.
